text: A fool and his money are soon parted.
author: Thomas Tusser

text: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

text: Marrying into money was not a good thing for me.
author: Anna Nicole Smith

text: I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's.
author: Dean Kamen

text: If I can't get the girl, at least give me more money.
author: Alan Alda
